data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the county of Nalbari who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nalbari, Assam, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the county of Nalbari to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 771,600 souls in Nalbari and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Nalbari, Assam, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Murasing people. Make the Murasing people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Nalbari, Assam, India that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 8,488 believers living in Nalbari, Assam, India.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Nalbari, Assam, India has a population of 771,600.

We estimate Nalbari has 8,488 people who might know Jesus, 9,362 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 753,750 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Nalbari, Assam, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.
